Text.val: -- BXA008/BXA201(BXA008 => country = 'DE', BXA201 => country <> 'DE'
Author: Juergen Paarmann
program runs BXA006 and BXA008 and ........ frequently
30.09.2013 SH SCR16662 Added call of new version of BXA009 (inlc. new TX09 selection), triggered via GSET_YESNO(8108)
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
16.01.2013 GB SCR17863 Part 5: Changed condition of call the Step 2
03.01.2011 SH SCR16057 Extended BXA020 argument list (PI.TYPEOFDRAFTS and
18.08.2008 SH SCR13879 Removed BXA026 handling
25.07.2008 SH SCR13788 Added new part "RunBXA038"
09.08.2007 SH SCR12472 RunBXA020: Added task to avoid dirty reads on TX20
29.03.2007 SH SCR12397 RunBXA009: Added test on PAYD_LETTER_TYPE <> '' to call
05.12.2006 SH SCR12150 RunBXA008/BXA021 Changed cnd to perform programs acc. to
GNRL_CODE = or <> PL
30.10.2006 SH SCR11947 RunBXA435 --> Changed call of BXA435
11.07.2006 SH SCR11403 Added new part "RunBXA435"
07.04.2006 SH SCR10850 Fixe bug in RunBXA009 (GroupLevels missing)
02.02.2006 SH SCR10238 Extended test to call BXA008 with "or GNRL_CODE= NL"
and test to call BXA210 with "and GNRL_CODE <> NL"
08.08.2005 SH SCR8752 RunBXA020 --> Extended module to call BXA020 also
if TX20_HYPB_BATCHNO > 0 and no HYPB row exists
26.07.2005 SH SCR8547 RunBXA020 --> Extended module to call BXA020 only if
TX20_HYPB_BATCHNO = 0 or >0 and HYPB_SCANNED = Y
21.06.2005 SH SCR8503 Restructured "RunBXA009", see SCR for more details
19.05.2005 SH SCR8189 Added new part "RunBXA039"
19.05.2004 SH SCR6217 Added new part "RunBXA054"
16.04.2004 SH SCR5728 Removed call for BXA201 related to GNQC, BXA201 will be
called now in part "RunBXA008/BXA210" if GNRL_CODE <> 'DE'
14.04.2004 SH SCR5728 Added new call --> BXA201 (=previous BXA008 version for
countiers <> DE)
04.04.2004 SH SCR5444 RunBXA052 Reduced selection of TX52 rows
with TX52_LAWY_LAWYER = 0
04.07.2003 RR SCR3944 Added Handler to ignore record-locking
10.06.2003 SH SCR3721 BXA020 Added new arguments to list for call BXA020
23.05.2003 SH SCR3568 Added new call to a BXA program --> BXA026
13.05.2003 SH SCR3375 Check table GNQC to start the diff. BXA programs
07.05.2003 SH SCR3371 RunBXA009 Changed the deletion of TX09 rows, now a hole
- group will be deleted, before only one record was deleted (see other tasks)
04.03.2003 JJ SCR3070 changed parameters call BXA052
27.01.2003 SH SCR2809 Add new part BXA024
21.01.2003 SH SCR2851 Add new argument to list v.DeletionAllowed in tasks
- 'RunBXA052', 'RunBXA009', 'RunBXA008' which is responsible to delete the temp
- records per each BXA call
12.12.2002 SH SCR2688 Add two new arguments to call BXA006 PI.JOURNALNO and
- PI.HUSR_ID
21.11.2002 JJ fixed pars BXA009
21.10.2002 SH Add new parts BXA008 / BXA009 / BXA52
//10-10-2002 JP SCR#2156 change deletion of temporary records
- Add new part 3 "Run BXA020" -> Intercredit Specifications
- Removed separate deletetasks for deleting the tables TX06/TX019/TX020
- and delete the rows directly with "Batch Delete" -> Transaction on Recordlevel
30.09.2013 SH SCR16662 test on GSET_YESNO(8108) can be removed if the future when the new BXA009
version is fully tested
-- BXA009 has to be called only if there exist an letter type
... in case of blank letter type the related TX09 rows have to be stored
-- In case of big files are handled in BPH220 it could happens that TX20 rows
are selected (DIRTY READS) where the Transaction is not commited
So we try to update the current TX20, see task below, and if the row is still
locked, the current TX20 is skipped and the next TX20 will be selected
-- Select only TX54 rows where TX54_FREQCODE= 9 (immediately), rows where
-- TX54_FREQCODE= 1 will be handeld in the night with BXA054N
